mapper.select: SELECT tms_provider.adate, sku.number, tms_provider.plans_number, tms_provider.actual_number, tms_provider.lack_number, tms_provider.damage_number, tms_provider.unit, tms_provider.claimant_id FROM oms_assessment_tms_provider tms_provider LEFT JOIN oms_sku sku ON sku.id = tms_provider.id tms_provider.is_delete = 'N'
